name: Spider Fighter (Commodore 64/128)
description:
This is a remake of my favourite Atari 2600 game for Commodore 64. The object of game is to protect an orchard containing fruits (grapes, strawberries, oranges, and bananas) from four kinds of insects.

Use joystick in port 2 to play.

Except for a couple of minor details, the original Atari 2600 manual applies to this port. You can get it from here.
